normalised: **social media buzz: brand collaborations are the new chai!**

unnormalised: **Social Media Buzz: Brand Collabs are the New Chai!**
normalised: move over, sponsored posts! brand collaborations are totally trending in influencer marketing, especially around festive times like onam. we are seeing some seriously creative partnerships popping up.

unnormalised: Move over, sponsored posts! Brand collaborations are totally trending in influencer marketing, especially around festive times like Onam. We're seeing some seriously creative partnerships popping up.
normalised: remember that crazy campaign between a local biryani chain in hyderabad, "paradise biryani", and a popular travel influencer, "neha explores"? neha documented her biryani journey across the city, hitting up different paradise outlets. pure genius!

unnormalised: Remember that crazy campaign between a local biryani chain in Hyderabad, "Paradise Biryani", and a popular travel influencer, "Neha Explores"? Neha documented her biryani journey across the city, hitting up different Paradise outlets. Pure genius!
normalised: even I I T bombay students are getting in on the action, with some collaborating with tech brands for app reviews.

unnormalised: Even IIT Bombay students are getting in on the action, with some collaborating with tech brands for app reviews.
normalised: word on the street (err, instagram feed) is that big brands like reliance are now prioritizing authentic collaborations with micro-influencers over flashy celebrity endorsements. apparently, it is all about that relatable connect with the audience.

unnormalised: Word on the street (err, Instagram feed) is that big brands like Reliance are now prioritizing authentic collaborations with micro-influencers over flashy celebrity endorsements. Apparently, it's all about that relatable connect with the audience.
normalised: analysts are saying this trend is set to explode further, with projected growth reaching upwards of rupee five hundred crore in the next year. so, buckle up, folks, and get ready to see even more unexpected (and hopefully delicious) brand pairings! who knows, maybe haldiram's will collab with a fitness influencer next?

unnormalised: Analysts are saying this trend is set to explode further, with projected growth reaching upwards of Rs. 500 crore in the next year.
